revisions.rev:
{{Refimprove|date=July 2011}} This is a '''list of fictitious films''' that have been referenced in various forms of media. These "films" are usually part of the storyline in a movie or television episode, usually either as a prop or as a recurring theme visited throughout, such as the fictitious ''Stab'' trilogy in the [[Scream (film series)|''Scream'' franchise]].
Each fictitious film listed is categorised under the film's [[genre]], with its source and, if applicable, the film's supposed release date.
{{Expand list|date=February 2009}}
